name: Pouch Of Infinite Wealth
description: It looks like an ordinary leather bag with a hundred coins in it. After you empty the pouch, you throw it into the corner. But the next day, to your surprise, you find that it is filled with coins. And you know that this must be the legendary Pouch of Infinite Wealth. So you begin to empty it again and wait...

name: The Crystal Of Tear
description: This blue crystal is in the shape of a teardrop. When it is placed underneath the open sky, it glows under the moonlight. You can feel the energy of the moon beams flowing into the crystal when you touch the crystal with your finger. The magic power in the crystal suddenly begins to flow into your body, and you suddenly understand that this is the legendary Crystal Tear

name: Excalibur
description: The long blade shines with a mystical light when it is drawn out of its scabbard. You notice that there are many runes inscribed on the blade. You feel the power of the sword flowing into your body, and you know immediately that this must be the sword of legends.

name: Pan's Flute
description: It appears to be a normal instrument, but when you play it, it gives off such a beautiful melody that everyone nearby stops what they are doing to listen to the music. Your enemies can do nothing but listen to the music, thus weakening their attack.

name: The Apparatus
description: This strange and bulky machine has many strange levers and buttons on it . You have no idea how to operate it, but it gives out a weird noise as if something is being fixed inside of it. Suddenly a large puddle spills out of the machine and slowly takes the shape of a monster.

name: Tome Of The Yetis
description: You feel a strong power emanating from this ancient tome. Its pages are filled with arcane incantations you have never come across before. In the corner of each page is a small drawing of a red fish. All of a sudden, you are reminded of the herring feast you held last winterâ€¦
